business_info.name: Yonsei Midas Dental Clinic
business_info.address: 127 Gonghang Culture-ro, Jung-gu, Incheon, South Korea
business_info.description_en: English-speaking dentist near Incheon Airport. Premium dental care for international patients. Specializing in dental implants, teeth whitening, and cosmetic dentistry. 10 minutes from Incheon International Airport.
business_info.description_kr: 인천공항 10분 거리 연세미다스치과. 외국인 환자 전문 치과. 임플란트, 미백, 교정치료 전문. 영어, 일본어, 중국어 진료 가능.
business_info.description_ja: 仁川空港から10分の延世ミダス歯科。外国人患者専門の歯科医院。インプラント、ホワイトニング、矯正治療の専門医。英語・日本語・中国語診療可能。
business_info.description_zh: 距离仁川机场10分钟的延世米达斯牙科。专门为外国患者提供服务。专业种植牙、美白、正畸治疗。提供英语、日语、中文诊疗服务。
